column2: text
With my reservations, we agree.
Best start running. Let's see how far you make it…
Fine, now leave this sacred ground!
You have taken something of ours. Return it now!
Show some wisdom in your consideration of this.
The Priestesses extend a branch. Do you accept or break it?
A pause in the slaughter. Think, than act.
As unreasonable as a Skeggi berserker.
A fool to attempt to bargain with fools.
I expected nothing more.
Do not overstay your welcome, the jungle can be a cruel mistress.
Leave now, before you become so many bones lying in the jungle.
I Penethesilea, have slain thoses twice your size.
Priestesses blessings. We agree to this.
By the Great Mother, we accept.
The time has come for you to offer tribute.
Consider this carefully. Your life hangs in the balance.
We await your response.
From the Goddess to your ears. Listen well.
This, we cannot accept.
The priestesses warn us away from this.
We have forseen, this does not bode well for either of us.
I Penethesilea, welcome you to our camp, but do not overstay that welcome.
It is rare for the Amazons to welcome outsiders, do not betray our trust.
Did you stumble here by choice or by luck I wonder?
This is agreeable, but barely.
You dance with vipers. Careful not to get bitten.
This is acceptable tribute.
Your offering will be presented before the Great Mother.
It cannot compare to anything we have, but the gesture is welcome.
So… you can be reasoned with.
Wisdom is so rare to find in outsiders.
With arrows aimed at you, what choice did you really have?
What whimsy lead you to breaking this?
Shortsighted. Driven by impulse and not wisdom.
We have forseen that this will be the start of your downfall.
A fateful decision. Will you make it out of the jungle to regret it?
Don't get lost on your way out, even the plants here are hungry.
The mighty jungle will be your undoing.
Jarl Sigursen thought he could best us, now he has no head.
By Kalith! Not one of you will leave the jungle alive!
Protect the temples! Kill the interlopers!
We have forseen, this does not bode well for either of us to continue.
The priestesses choose a different path.
We do not need this anymore. Do not ask for our reasons.
Help us drive out the invaders! The invaders must die!
Together we shall bring death to our enemies!
Two predators can take down greater prey together.
Unknowingly, you have something of ours. Return it.
We come bearing an offer.
The priestesses have an offer. Do you accept?
Here are the terms. Do with them as you will.
The Amazons have no want for your placations.
No, that is final.
Do not push this further. No.
You tred in dangerous places. Let us show you the way.
We heard you from far away. Stumbling and brutish. Amusing. Let us help.
Fool! You nearly disturbed a Spikethorn. We'll teach you how to survive.
The tide of prophecy takes us away from war.
The Great Mother, Kalith, seeks peace for her children.
The jungle sleeps. Our fury is satiated.
Together we shall be an unstoppable tide of savage rage!
Defending your home is a noble cause. We wish to help you in this.
These ones have trespassed against us as well. We will help settle the score.
These coins mean nothing. Take them and leave.
The blessing of Amex filled our coffers. Let us fill yours.
Gold flows like the waters of the Amaxon - from our hands to yours.
More adventurers seeking to plunder our temples. Why should we not kill you where you stand?
At long last you behold the mighty Amazons. Speak now, or we will be the last thing you ever see.
Do not speak with your foreign silver tongue or we will cut it from your mouth.
No! The crimes you have committed against us cannot be soothed by peace. Only blood and war!
We shall drive all of you outsiders from our jungle homes! Never!
Not until you shudder in fear at the mere mention of my name.
HA! No.
We have no need of your trappings. No.
Join? With you? I think not.
We shall visit a thousand painful deaths upon you!
The earth of the jungle shall be your grave!
The rising tide cannot be stopped! The fury of Kalith cannot be denied!
